name: Verdant (Ai Xia)
description:
In 2131, a drawn out world war for the last natural resources has nearly destroyed all livable land on Earth. Global population has rapidly decline due to the war and contaminated air and water caused by it, and most civilians are now being drafted to fight in the battle. You were recently drafted and posted on a ship in the southernmost regions of Argentina, but an air raid wrecked the ship and tossed you into the icy water…

Instructions:

  • Download Zip file and open "Final Project"

Created & developed by Ai Xia, Dora Do & Zaida Alamen in Virtual Worlds, a 2 week class at NYU IMA/ITP.
